description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Joshua Birk - Principal Developer Evangelist at Salesforce

ABSTRACT
The Internet of Things has expanded into a diverse array of hardware options and development routes.  Using maker favorites like Raspberry Pi and Arduino boards or even consumer models like Amazon Echo, developers can connect these devices together across the Internet to [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
